label: uncl5049
comment: Code specifying a type of contribution scheme.

values.label: Company award
values.comment: Company payment as per an industry or similar industrial award agreement.

values.label: Company over-award
values.comment: Company payment which is higher than an industry or similar award agreement.

values.label: Lump sum
values.comment: Payment is in the form of a single payment.

values.label: Company voluntary
values.comment: A company payment which is paid on a voluntary basis.

values.label: Member voluntary
values.comment: A member payment which is paid on a voluntary basis.

values.label: Member individual
values.comment: Single payment by an individual member.

values.label: Group
values.comment: Payment as part of a group plan or scheme.

values.label: Other
values.comment: Contribution type differs from any of the other coded values.
